results.description: You start singing your spells. For 1 minute, every time you try to cast a spell, you must succeed on a performance check (DC 10 + level of the spell, 10 for cantrips) or the spell has no effect and you lose the spell slot.
You must make a wisdom save or be goaded for 1 minute by a nearby mundane object of the GM's choice belonging to one of your companions.
Your voice changes to something of your choice that sounds nothing like you. You have to spend an action coughing vigorously to restore your original voice.
You become slippery for 1 minute. You have advantage on rolls to avoid being grappled or restrained, but disadvantage on rolls to avoid being pushed or knocked prone.
A probably nonmagical cow appears in a spot within 15 ft. of you. The cow is controlled by the GM and is permanent.
A silent duplicate of yourself wearing a rainbow outfit appears near you for 1 minute. The duplicate has half your hit point maximum and only dances and takes the dodge action.
You become blurry. Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you for 1 minute.
For 1 minute or until you become incapacitated, you tapdance flawlessly when you walk and can't be knocked prone.
During your next short or long rest, a ghost of someone you knew appears before you and tells you something they want to tell you. This message isn't always important.
Choose a hostile creature you can see. Illusions and harmless magical effects hinder them from harming your allies. They have disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 round.
You say something that's edgy or confusing. A creature of your choice within 60 ft. must make a wisdom save or take 4d6 psychic damage.
You say something that's nice or amusing. A creature of your choice within 60 ft. must make a wisdom save or be charmed by you for 1 minute.

You can choose to shout encouraging words at a creature who is injured, unconscious, or dying. Roll a DC 15 persuasion check. If you succeed, the target regains 10 hit points and stands up and regains consciousness if applicable.

Choose a target within 30 ft. You conjure flying animated kitchenware around a creature within 30 ft. Until they move, willingly or unwillingly, they have half cover. When they move, the kitchenware vanishes.
The veil opens, and you see everything in distorted colors for 1 minute. Other than this distortion, you have blindsight and truesight with a radius of 60 ft. for the duration.
Your skin becomes very hard to cut for 1 minute. You gain resistance to piercing and slashing damage for this duration. You are aware of this effect, but you look the same as before.
You regain 3 sorcery points. If you go above your maximum and don't spend the excess points, your sorcery point total will be lowered to your maximum after 1 minute.
After casting your spell, you can choose to immediately cast Blink as part of the same action without you requiring to concentrate on it.
Any metamagic options you apply to this spell are free.
